text:
Poisons (Prescribed Periods) Amendment Order 2014

I make the following order under section 59A of the Poisons Act 1971 .

10 February 2014

MICHELLE O'BYRNE

Minister for Health

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Poisons (Prescribed Periods) Amendment Order 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Poisons (Prescribed Periods) Order 2009 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Poisons (Prescribed Periods) Order 2009 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 February 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
